author.organization: Centre for Research and Innovation Hellas

abstract.t: This document specifies the Connectivity Provisioning Negotiation Protocol (CPNP) which is used for dynamic negotiation of service parameters. CPNP is a generic protocol that can be used for various negotiation purposes that include (but are not necessarily limited to) connectivity provisioning services, storage facilities, Content Delivery Networks footprint, etc. The protocol can be extended with new Information Elements.
